definitions: A member of a mythical race of female warriors believed to live in Scythia (near the Black Sea).
A tall, strong, or athletic woman.
A large South American river, the second longest in the world, flowing from the Andes Mountains to the Atlantic Ocean.
A vast rainforest in South America, mainly in Brazil, through which the Amazon river flows.
A large, brightly coloured parrot native to tropical America.
An American multinational technology company focusing on e-commerce, cloud computing, online advertising, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.
examples: She was a real Amazon on the rugby field.
The Amazon River is home to unique wildlife.
Deforestation is a major threat to the Amazon rainforest.
My neighbour has a beautiful Amazon parrot.
I ordered a new book from Amazon.
